comment.language: For the Commemoration of St. Rebecca:

text.language: Ni pictoc m~marturoc: etaufai qa nidiwgmoc: eybe piran m~pin/b P,#c#: IereBekka nem necs/ri.
The faithful martyrs, who endured persecution, for the name of Christ the Lord, Rebecca and her children.

language.div: Para martir yang setia, yang tanggung aniaya, demi nama Kristus Tuhan, Rebeka dan anak-anaknya.

text.language: الشهداء الأمناء، الذين تحملوا الأضطهادات، من أجل أسم السيد المسيح، رفقة وأولادها.
Enaus~l/l afouwnh nwou: e~bol n~je p~aggeloc m~Po#c#?: auounof m~mwou etaf hisennoufi: nwou qen ]metmarturoc.
While they were praying, the Lord’s angel appeared to them, they rejoiced when he announced, to them their martyrdom.

language.div: Saat mereka sedang berdoa, malaikat Tuhan tampakkan diri pada mereka, mereka bersukacita ketika ia beritakan kemartiran mereka.

text.language: لما كانوا يصلون، ظهر لهم ملاك الرب، وفرحوا لما بشرهم، بالأستشهاد.
Au] n~nouhupar,onta: n~nih/ki aut/itou m~v~mou: m~pouywt n~tououwst n~ni~dwlon: auhitou e~pi,~rwm m~poumoh.
They gave their wealth to the poor, they gave up themselves to death, and refused to worship the idols, they threw them into fire but did not burn.

language.div: Mereka berikan harta mereka pada orang miskin, serahkan diri mereka pada maut, tolak sembah berhala; mereka dilempar ke dalam api, namun tak terbakar.

text.language: أعطوا أموالهم للفقراء، وسلموا أنفسهم للموت، ولم يرضوا أن يسجدوا للأصنام وألقوهم فى النار ولم يحترقوا.
Qen Rako] aucepcwpou qen: p~swou m~piyo n~tou,a pounou]: ouoh auerayetin n~noujin]: auasou de euoi n~rabnahbi.
In Alexandria they tempted them, with the glory of the world to deny their God, they rejected their offerings, and were crucified heads down.

language.div: Di Aleksandria mereka dicobai, dengan kemuliaan dunia 'tuk sangkal Allah mereka, mereka tolak tawaran itu, dan disalibkan dengan kepala di bawah.

text.language: وفى أسكندرية أغووهم، بمجد الدنيا ليتركوا إلههم، فأحتقروا عطاياهم، فصلبوهم منكسين.
Menenca somt n~e~hoou euj/k: auo~hi eratou eutouj/out: au,atou qen ouneh efberber: m~pou[iywbs nimatoi ausahseh.
After three full days, they were raised in good health, then they put them in boiling oil, they were not harmed the soldiers were inflamed.

language.div: Setelah tiga hari, mereka dibangkitkan dalam keadaan sehat; lalu mereka dimasukkan ke dalam minyak mendidih, namun tak terluka, justru para prajurit yang terbakar.

text.language: وبعد ثلاثة أيام كاملة، قاموا معافين، ووضعوا فى زيت مغلى، لم يتأثروا والتهب الجنود.
Ausat nia~v/ou n~nis/ri qen: p~am/r n~toumau i~ta teca~ve: nipictoc auket ouekkl/cia: nwou auouwnh n~je nous~v/ri e~bol.
They beheaded the children, on the lap of their mother and then her head, the believers built a church for them their miracles appeared.

language.div: Anak-anaknya dipenggal di pangkuan ibunya, dan kepalanya pun ditebas; umat percaya bangun gereja bagi mereka, mujizat mereka mulai tampak.

text.language: قطعت رؤوس الأبناء، فى حجر أمهم ثم رأسها، وبنى المؤمنون كنيسة لهم، فظهرت عجائبهم.
<ere nwten w~ nimarturoc: etausep hanm/s m~bacanoc: eybe poumei m~P,#c#: rasi m~mwten qen piparadicoc.
Hail to you O martyrs, who accepted many sufferings, for their love to Christ, rejoice in the Paradise.

language.div: Salam bagimu, hai para martir, yang terima banyak penderitaan, karena kasih mereka pada Kristus, bersukacitalah di Firdaus.

text.language: السلام لكم أيها الشهداء، الذين قبلوا آلامات كثيرة، من أجل محبتهم للمسيح، إفرحوا فى الفردوس.
